Posted By: Silverware (10/18/2009 11:33:26 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Well a zombie lord makes it work. Pretty great with [Death Baron](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Baron). Still, a 3/3 flying deathtouching regenerator for seven and two colors, hmm alright I suppose but pricey. I guess throw in [Zombie Warchief](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zombie Warchief), but then whats the point, turn five to pay four mana to cast this guy. At least it's boosted.
  
   
Ideally, T3 Death Baron, T4 Undead Warchief, T5 Tattered Drake for a 5/4 flying regenerating deathtoucher. Not bad I guess.
